name: Energy Concentrating Component
desc:
It was once an ordinary moving clockwork component but someone added an energy storage ring made from high-density materials.

Perhaps just this single component is capable of powering the entire machine...

customize.name: Energy Concentrating Component
customize.desc:
It was once an ordinary moving clockwork component but someone added an energy storage ring made from high-density materials.

Perhaps just this single component is capable of powering the entire machine...

customize.text: in total. They can be used to unlock a cage containing a Luxurious Chest in <color=#ece5d8>Kuisel's Clockwork Workshop</color> , which will grant the achievement <color=#ffd780>The Worst! Fontaine's Eight Evil Clockwork Knights!</color> .

value.text: Obtained from defeating select meks in the Liffey and Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region
